metadata.synopsis: First-time meeting a mimic chest in Act1 Underdark (Grymforge)
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load WLD_Main, teleport to (-684 -5 375), interact with any of the three chests nearby: try open, move, attack, etc.

1.context: CinematicNodeContext: The mimic wakes up, player is close byInternalNodeContext: The mimic wakes up, player is close by

3.context: CinematicNodeContext: The mimic wakes up, the player is far awayInternalNodeContext: The mimic wakes up, the player is far away
